ver 0.1.0
=========

:Release date: 2025-04-26 (Asia/Tokyo)
:Dart Sass version: 1.87.0

First release.

Features
--------

* Define 2 mode.

  * Mode as wrapper of CLI to compile sources from string, file or directory.
  * Mode as client of The Embedded Sass Protocol (low-level).
